cards.name: The Magician
cards.meaning_up: Skill, diplomacy, address, subtlety; sickness, pain, loss, disaster, snares of enemies; self-confidence, will; the Querent, if male.
cards.meaning_rev: Physician, Magus, mental disease, disgrace, disquiet.
cards.desc: A youthful figure in the robe of a magician, having the countenance of divine Apollo, with smile of confidence and shining eyes. Above his head is the mysterious sign of the Holy Spirit...

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.meaning_up: Secrets, mystery, the future as yet unrevealed; the woman who interests the Querent, if male; the Querent herself, if female; silence, tenacity; mystery, wisdom, science.
cards.meaning_rev: Passion, moral or physical ardour, conceit, surface knowledge.
cards.desc: She has the lunar crescent at her feet, a horned diadem on her head, with a globe in the middle place, and a large solar cross on her breast. The scroll in her hands is inscribed with the word Tora...

cards.name: The Empress
cards.meaning_up: Fruitfulness, action, initiative, length of days; the unknown, clandestine; also difficulty, doubt, ignorance.
cards.meaning_rev: Light, truth, the unravelling of involved matters, public rejoicings; according to another reading, vacillation.
cards.desc: A stately figure, seated, having rich vestments and royal aspect, as of a daughter of heaven and earth. Her diadem is of twelve stars...

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.meaning_up: Stability, power, protection, realization; a great person; aid, reason, conviction; also authority and will.
cards.meaning_rev: Benevolence, compassion, credit; also confusion to enemies, obstruction, immaturity.
cards.desc: He has a form of the Crux ansata for his sceptre and a globe in his left hand. He is a crowned monarchâ€”commanding, stately, seated on a throne...

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.meaning_up: Marriage, alliance, captivity, servitude; by another account, mercy and goodness; inspiration; the man to whom the Querent has recourse.
cards.meaning_rev: Society, good understanding, concord, overkindness, weakness.
cards.desc: He wears the triple crown and is seated between two pillars, but they are not those of the Temple which is guarded by the High Priestess...
